pages.speaker: steven
lines: So you did come... I have been waiting for you.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: ... What terrible heat...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: It feels as though the entire world will be burnt away...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Ah, yes. You need to hear what my friend has to say.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: My name is Wallace. I'm this town's Gym Leader.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: I've also been entrusted with the protection of the Cave of Origin.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: This drought is being caused by a power emanating from the Cave of Origin.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: This sunlight...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: People and Pokémon need sunlight to live...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: So why does this sunlight fill us with so much dread?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: The blazing sun over Sootopolis is growing even more intense...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Soon all of Hoenn will be caught under its withering glare...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: If that were to happen...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: That is the Blue Orb.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: I see. Follow me.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=985,y=69,z=1512,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 985 69 1512 maxie_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=981,y=69,z=1510,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 981 69 1510 archie_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=989,y=69,z=1510,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 989 69 1510 tabitha_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=979,y=69,z=1523,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 979 70 1523 wallace_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=991,y=69,z=1523,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 991 70 1523 steven_generic');

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Team Magma...and Team Aqua...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: We've been waiting, ya scamp!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Leader Maxie...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: to that child...?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: ...I know what must be done.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: I will entrust this to you now.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: It is the fruit of our collaboration with the Devon Corporation, and it represents the height of Hoenn's technological knowledge and skill.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:keyitem ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');

pages.speaker: player
lines: You obtained the Magma Suit!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: We had actually been preparing that in anticipation of making contact with Groudon...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: But at this point, it doesn't look like there's any hope of that for us...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: There's nothing we can do except leave it to you.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: And yet...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: Even with that Magma Suit, is it probable that anyone could pass through that magma,

pages.speaker: leader
lines: now fiercer than ever due to the forces of nature?

pages.speaker: admin
lines: That's true.

pages.speaker: admin
lines: It is very possible that its energy could be far greater than our calculations show.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: There is nothing to fear.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: The Blue Orb they bear...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Its ancient powers will protect both the trainer and their Pokémon.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: You've hit the nail on the head!

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Those old folks at Mt. Pyre did say something about that...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: That the Red Orb would unleash Groudon's primal powers...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: And trigger a Primal Reversion.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: ...While the Blue Orb had the power to reverse that and calm the beast.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Yes. The energy overflowing from the Cave of Origin just now...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: It is the same energy that gives Groudon its power...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: With the Blue Orb, which contains the power to suppress that...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: It should be possible to calm the rage of this flood of magma.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Of course the Blue Orb's power alone will not lead you to where Groudon waits.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: You will not reach Hoenn's Core that way.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Use the suit that you were just given.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: With that, it will finally become possible to stand up against the forces of nature.

lines.expression: '' + q.player.username + '... To think that you had the Blue Orb...';

pages.speaker: steven
lines: You'll be OK.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: You and your Pokémon can handle it, whatever happens.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I believe that.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: No man or woman from Sootopolis is permitted to enter the Cave of Origin.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: But you must go, together with your Blue Orb.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: You must go regardless of what waits for you inside that cave...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: We'll also get our people together up top here, to help any folks and Pokémon in trouble.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: My little scamp of a savior...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Looks like we're making you bear all the burden on your little shoulders alone.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: I'm sorry for that. ...But I know you're going to see this through!

pages.speaker: leader
lines: Child, you...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: No. I have no right to call you "child."

pages.speaker: leader
lines: Fellow Trainer.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: I have caused great harm, and for that I apologize most sincerely.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: But now we find ourselves at an impasse, and you and your Pokémon are all that humanity has to count on in its stand against Groudon...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: The fate of our world...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: The world upon which all humanity thrives...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: The fate of our world rests in your hands!

action: q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=985,y=68,z=1526,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 985 69 1526 may_generic');

pages.speaker: rival
lines: I heard on the news that things were going haywire around Sootopolis.

lines.expression: 'And then I saw you on BuzzNav, ' + q.player.username + '!';

pages.speaker: rival
lines: I couldn't just sit there and do nothing when I knew you were here in the thick of it, so I came flying!

pages.speaker: rival
lines: Bwuh?! Isn't that Team Aqua? And Team Magma?!

pages.speaker: rival
lines: OK, can I just say that I am, like, shocked and confused on so many levels right now?

pages.speaker: rival
lines: This is probably something way bigger than I can even imagine, isn't it?

pages.speaker: rival
lines: So I'm not even going to ask right now.

pages.speaker: rival
lines: I'm going to try to find what I can do to help, and then I'm going to do my best with that.

lines.expression: 'And I am going to keep on hoping and believing that y-you'll be OK out there, ' + q.player.username + '.';

pages.speaker: rival
lines: Because...

pages.speaker: rival
lines: Because you... You're the best friend I have!

pages.speaker: rival
lines: I'll always be right there behind you.

pages.speaker: rival
lines: You're my best friend, after all!
